title: New feature
description: Stock payout frequency is now a filter option on the main table.

title: New (BIG) feature
description: All stocks with a quarterly payout have been added to the database, increasing the number of available stocks by over 600%!

title: New feature
description: Added a graph to the stock pages for full dividend history. Read more in the changelog.

title: New feature
description: Split dividend records into two categories. Read more in the changelog.

title: New feature
description: Increased chart sizes to encompass all records for the respective stock.

title: New feature
description: Added year values to recorded payouts column.

title: New feature
description: Added filters for stock types to the search table.

title: New feature
description: Added stock types to individual stock pages. More to come soon.

title: New feature
description: Added expanded stock titles to tables at larger view sizes. See changelog for more information.
